translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

I acknowledge receipt of your office of the 11th of the current month, and of the responses to Your Lordship from D. Ana Joaquina da Silva Santos, D. Guiomar Maria Soares, Júlio César Centeno, and Joaquim Vieira Braga, which accompanied it, which I will bring before the presence of the Most Excellent

God keep Your Lordship Secretariat of the Treasury in Piratini, August 25, 1838. (a) Domingos José de Almeida.

Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, Chief of Police of the Boqueirão Department. From the Ministry of the Treasury. Office received on the 30th of the same month.
